page.title: 07A ROTHLEY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I go to Rothley Primary School.{It {has ten teachers,one caretaker,one {cook and six dinner ladies. A normal day starts at 8:55am when we go in to assembly.After assembly we have lessons.We have one teacher to teach us all the lessons and usually the first lesson is{Mathematics}.Then at 10.30 we have playtime.At the end of play the whistle is blown and we go to our classroom.Then we have {English.}At 5 to 12 we wash our hands and line up for dinner. At 12 a clock we have our dinner and have our play at 12.30 and onwards to 1.30.Then we go back to our classroom.After dinner time we do{Art {or Craft}.Then we do{P.E}we have different apparatus and mats.At the end of the day we have a story called "Wind in the Willows". Finally we go home at 3.30.
